reviews.review_msg: Hist417 class was probably one of the best courses of my history undergrad. She genuinely put in so much effort to make an intersession course interesting and manageable. There are lots of weekly discussions and reflections that make it mandatory to keep up with the readings/videos/podcasts but she's flexible on deadlines, especially with COVID.
This was the best class I've had so far at SFU. Go to her office hours, they help a lot. She was a very cool prof who cared about her students. Work hard, get a good grade.
